CoverScope.Name: Cover Removal Scope
CoverScope.Hint: Choose which tokens are affected when cover is cleared: everyone on the scene, only combatants, or player-owned tokens.

OnlyInCombat.Name: Apply Cover Only In Combat
OnlyInCombat.Hint: If enabled, automatic cover calculation only runs while a combat encounter is active.

RemoveOnCombat.Name: Clear Cover on Combat Updates
RemoveOnCombat.Hint: Automatically remove the Cover condition on combat changes (turn/round/initiative), honoring the selected Cover Removal Scope.

RemoveOnMove.Name: Clear Cover on Token Movement
RemoveOnMove.Hint: Automatically remove the Cover condition when a token moves during active combat, honoring the selected Cover Removal Scope.

CreaturesHalfOnly.Name: Limit Cover from Creatures to 1/2 Cover
CreaturesHalfOnly.Hint: When enabled, creatures can grant at most Half Cover. As soon as at least one line is blocked purely by creatures, the target gains Half Cover, but never Three-Quarters Cover from creatures alone. Walls continue to follow the standard DMG rules.

IgnoreAllAOE.Name: Ignore cover for all area effects
IgnoreAllAOE.Hint: Skips cover checks whenever the activity defines any area template. If a template is present, no cover is calculated for that roll.

IgnoreDistanceAOE.Name: Ignore cover for ranged AoE templates
IgnoreDistanceAOE.Hint: Skips cover checks for activities that create an area at range (e.g., Fireball). This applies when the activity has a range greater than 1 and uses an AoE template with range units other than self/touch/special.

IgnoreDistanceSpace.Name: Ignore cover for ranged space targeting
IgnoreDistanceSpace.Hint: Skips cover checks when the activity targets a space at range (range > 1 and affects type is "space"). This is commonly used by summon features/spells, where the actual attack/effect is resolved from the summoned creature. Cover should be evaluated from the summon instead of the source feature/spell.

Hover.Name: Hover Cover Display
Hover.Hint: Controls whether and how cover information and distance are shown when hovering a token.

HoverLabelPosition.Name: Hover Label Position
HoverLabelPosition.Hint: Choose where the hover label is anchored relative to the target token.

HoverLabelYOffset.Name: Hover Label Y Offset
HoverLabelYOffset.Hint: Additional vertical offset (in pixels) applied to the hover label position. Positive values move the label downward, negative values upward.

HoverLabelXOffset.Name: Hover Label X Offset
HoverLabelXOffset.Hint: Additional horizontal offset (in pixels) applied to the hover label position. Positive values move the label to the right, negative values to the left.

GridlessDistanceMode.Name: Gridless Distance Mode
GridlessDistanceMode.Hint: Choose how distance is measured on gridless scenes: center-to-center or edge-to-edge.

GridlessTokenShape.Name: Gridless Token Shape
GridlessTokenShape.Hint: Controls how tokens in gridless scenes are approximated for distance and cover: as square footprints or as circular footprints with multi-circle layouts for larger creatures.

CreaturesProne.Name: Prone Creature Height Adjustment
CreaturesProne.Hint: Controls how prone creatures are treated when building their 3D prism for cover calculations. When the "Wall Height" module is active, "Treat as one size smaller" falls back to half height.

Debug.Name: Show Cover Debug Lines
Debug.Hint: Draw helper lines while computing cover between tokens (for debugging/troubleshooting).

CreatureHeights.Name: Default Creature Heights
CreatureHeights.Hint: Default creature heights (in Grid Units) per size category used for 3D cover evaluation. When the "Wall Height" module is active, these defaults are ignored and heights are taken from that module instead.

HeightsMenu.Name: Configure Creature Heights
HeightsMenu.Label: Creature Heights
HeightsMenu.Hint: Adjust default heights (in Grid Units) for each creature size used when computing cover. When the "Wall Height" module is active, these defaults are ignored and heights are taken from that module instead.
HeightsMenu.BodyHint: Set the default height (in Grid Units) for each creature size. These values are used when treating tokens as 3D prisms for cover. When the "Wall Height" module is active, these defaults are ignored and heights are taken from that module instead.

VariantMenu.Name: Configure Cover & Measurement Rules
VariantMenu.Label: Cover & Measurement Rules
VariantMenu.Hint: Configure how Simple Cover 5e calculates cover and measures distance on your scenes.
